name: Masala Dosa
description: Classic crispy dosa with potato masala filling, served with sambar and chutney at the main canteen.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced chicken, slow-cooked and served with raita.

name: Coffee at Nescafe Corner
description: Hot instant coffee — the campus classic for a quick energy boost between classes.

name: Paneer Tikka Wrap
description: Grilled paneer tikka wrapped in a soft roti with mint chutney and onions.

name: Ramen Bowl (Pop-up Stall)
description: Limited-time ramen pop-up near the library. Rich tonkotsu broth with soft-boiled egg.

name: Idli-Sambar Plate
description: Steamed idlis with piping hot sambar and coconut chutney. Light and wholesome.

name: Open Mic Night
description: Weekly open mic at the amphitheatre. Perform or watch — great way to discover campus talent.

name: Samosa + Chai Combo
description: Two crispy samosas with a hot cup of cutting chai. The unbeatable campus classic.

name: Robotics Club Workshop
description: Hands-on Arduino workshop by the Robotics Club. Build a mini line-follower bot.

name: Fresh Fruit Juice
description: Freshly squeezed seasonal fruit juice from the juice bar near Gate 2.

name: Veg Thali
description: Full vegetarian thali with dal, sabzi, roti, rice, papad, and pickle.

name: Midnight Maggi Stall
description: The iconic late-night Maggi stall outside the hostel. Cheese or egg Maggi available.
